job.title: Software Engineer (Intern)
job.description: ltstronggtWe Are Hiring For a Variety Of Roles IncludingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are looking for passionate motivated software engineering interns who are excited to build their experience as they develop tools to power the next generation of cloud applicationsltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltligt Distributed systemsltligtltligt Machine learningltligtltligt Frontendltligtltligt Observabilityltligtltligt Production servingltligtltligt Ecosystemltligtltligt Cltligtltligt Reinforcement LearningltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtAbout AnyscaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAnyscale provides an application development platform for developers to build distributed applications Were commercializing a popular open source project called Ray  which is a framework for distributed computing as well as an ecosystem of libraries for scalable machine learning Our goal is to build a standardized platform for distributed computing Ray was developed at UC Berkeley by Robert Nishihara and Philipp Moritz under the guidance of Ion Stoica and Michael Jordan and the four of them have cofounded Anyscale The company raised a 206M Series A and a 40M Series B funding from Andreessen Horowitz a16z NEA Foundation Capital Intel Capital Ant Financial Amplify Partners 112 Capital and The House FundltbrgtltbrgtWith Ray  were making it easy to program at any scale from your laptop to the datacenter by providing easytouse generalpurpose and highperformance tools In addition we are building a rich ecosystem of libraries for reinforcement learning hyperparameter search experiment management machine learning training prediction serving and more on top of the core distributed system so that users can rapidly build sophisticated applications Help us build the future of software developmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAs Part Of This Role You WillltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtDevelop high quality software to empower software developers and simplify programmingltligtltligtWork with a team of leading distributed systems and machine learning expertsltligtltligtCommunicate your work to a broader audience through talks tutorials and blog postsltligtltligtHelp us to build and shape a world class companyltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWed Love To Hear From You If YoultbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtAre passionate about machine learning and distributed systemsltligtltligtAre interested in working at a startup and making an impactltligtltligtHave relevant software engineering internship experiences at tech companies ltligtltligtHave side projects that showcase their passion for programming outside of the classroom setting ltligtltligtAre a at least a rising juniorltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtAbout AnyscaleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAnyscale provides an application development platform for developers to build distributed applications Were commercializing a popular open source project called Ray  which is a framework for distributed computing as well as an ecosystem of libraries for scalable machine learning Our goal is to build a standardized platform for distributed computing Ray was developed at UC Berkeley by Robert Nishihara and Philipp Moritz under the guidance of Ion Stoica and Michael Jordan and the four of them have cofounded Anyscale The company raised a 206M Series A and a 40M Series B funding from Andreessen Horowitz a16z NEA Foundation Capital Intel Capital Ant Financial Amplify Partners 112 Capital and The House FundltbrgtltbrgtWith Ray  were making it easy to program at any scale from your laptop to the datacenter by providing easytouse generalpurpose and highperformance tools In addition we are building a rich ecosystem of libraries for reinforcement learning hyperparameter search experiment management machine learning training prediction serving and more on top of the core distributed system so that users can rapidly build sophisticated applications Help us build the future of software
